actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon the request of a specified licensee, to extend for a maximum of three consecutive two-year periods the time required for commencement of construction of a certain hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio.

titles.title: To extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio.
